屁.definition: fart; flatulence; nonsense; (usu. in the negative) what; (not) a damn thing

屁事.definition: (vulgar) trifling matter; mere trifle; goddamn thing; goddamn business

屁滾尿流.definition: to piss one's pants in terror (idiom); scared witless

屁眼兒.definition: erhua variant of 屁眼[pi4 yan3]

屁精.definition: (slang) gay; sissy; poof; abbr. for 馬屁精|马屁精[ma3 pi4 jing1]

屁股決定腦袋.pinyin: pi4 gu5 jue2 ding4 nao3 dai5
屁股決定腦袋.definition: lit. the butt governs the head (idiom); fig. where one stands depends on where one sits; one's views are shaped by one's circumstances

屁股蹲兒.definition: (dialect) a fall on the buttocks; pratfall

屁顛屁顛.definition: lit. jolting buttocks; (colloquial intensifier) groveling; eager; compliant; smug
